Definition: In this task, you are given a statement spoken by a politician in natural language. Your task is to generate the subject of the discussion for the given statement. The subject generated is not necessarily a part of the given input. Your answer should contain one or more words.
Positive example 1-
input: Says the Annies List political group supports third-trimester abortions on demand.
output: abortion
Positive example 2-
input: In this last election in November, ... 63 percent of the American people chose not to vote, ... 80 percent of young people, (and) 75 percent of low-income workers chose not to vote.
output: election

input: Two-thirds of Wisconsinites receiving unemployment checks are not required to search for work due to current work search exemptions.
